I stand by what I've said about those events, but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on, said Andy Coulson , who had worked for David Cameron for 3 1/2 years. Press Gazetted reported in 2006 that phone-hacking, or`` screwing'' as it was known, was rife across Fleet Street before the Goodman and Mulcaire arrests. Gossip email newsletter Popbitch asked back in 2001: `` Which newspaper showbiz desk has a trick for getting stories out of celebs' mobile phones?( Two hacks simultaneously call a celeb's mobile. One gets the answerphone, and types in 9, followed by 3333. If the hapless celeb hasn't changed the default access code, the hack gets their messages, and can even delete them afterwards to cover their tracks). Mr Andy Coulson confirmed his resignation in a statement today( Friday), saying that the continued coverage of events during his time as the newspaper's editor had made it difficult for him to give the 110 per cent needed in this role . His senior defensive end/linebacker Jarrell McKinney signed with Western Michigan.`` He's my first Division I recruit,'' the Albert said of Jarrell McKinney . He has tremendous speed. He runs the 40 in 4.5. He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves.
